name: Addiction
description: Addiction bets is the first platform that allows you to bet on shitcoins (and more!). With us, you can not only buy shitcoins based on growth, but bet on whether the shitcoin, which is launched today, will break through 500.000 market cap, whether its admins will make a time rug or remove liquidity within 24 hours, whether the GMBL presale will get a $750,000 hard cap within 10 minutes, whether Ben will create his 4th shitcoin or whether $MOG will remove liquidity following the end of the lock-up period next month. Also, any user can offer their personal event to create a new bet, thereby earning on the commissions collected from this event.
